author: kgiusti
msg: NO-JIRA: reformat examples in the docs to fit in PDF output.

author: marvin
msg: Migrate CFC docs into C header files.
Move documentation for primary CFC components out of the .pm files and into
the .h files.  This migration is not lossless because most of the code samples
get eliminated, but we need to document the C code and a DRY violation to keep
the Perl interface docs would surely lead to bitrot.

author: marvin
msg: Move all Parser code for Hierarchy to C.
Remove some vestigial code for creating Hierarchy's parser in Perl-space, no
longer needed because Parser is now fully implemented in C.
